metadata.title: CVE-2019-12269 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: Enigmail before 2.0.11 allows PGP signature spoofing: for an inline PGP message, an attacker can cause the product to display a "correctly signed" message indication, but display different unauthenticated text.

criterions.comment: enigmail package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:2.0.11+ds1-1').
